fields.name: Motor vehicles per 1000 people (NationMaster (2014))
fields.description: Number of private motor vehicles per 1000 people in 2014 by country. 'Motor vehicle' includes automobiles, SUVs, trucks, vans, buses, commercial vehicles and freight motor road vehicles. This data excludes motorcycles and other two-wheelers.
